document_data.name: Blackraven Wagons, Doors, and Shutters
document_data.services: Custom wooden wagons, doors and shutters
document_data.mainbody: '''Blackraven Wagons, Doors, and Shutters''' was a woodworking shop run by one of [[Sundabar]]'s famous master carpenters, [[Hundarr Blackraven]]. It was an extremely efficient workshop, providing high-quality pieces in a short amount of time.
document_data.Goods: While Hundarr and his apprentices specialized in only the specific items advertised in the name of his shop, they were simple and strong pieces, with exceptionally sturdy joints and hinges.
